# Impression Labz
> AI solutions company based in California. We build intelligent agents, platform integrations, and custom AI systems using OpenClaw and Claude.

## About
Impression Labz is a California-based AI engineering firm specializing in building production-ready AI systems for enterprise platforms. We combine deep technical expertise with strategic insight to deliver autonomous agents, AI-powered platform integrations, and full-stack AI enablement programs.

## Services
- Platform AI Integration: Embedding LLMs, RAG pipelines, and decision systems into existing software platforms
- OpenClaw Agent Development: Custom autonomous agents built on the OpenClaw framework for multi-step task execution
- Agent Enablement: Deploying, training, and scaling AI agent fleets across enterprise organizations
- AI Consulting: Strategic AI roadmaps, opportunity identification, and ROI analysis for enterprise clients

## Technology
- Core Framework: OpenClaw (agent orchestration)
- AI Models: Claude (Anthropic), OpenAI GPT series
- Stack: Next.js, Python, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Vercel
- Specialties: Multi-agent systems, RAG, tool use, memory-augmented agents

## Contact
- Email: theo@impressionlabz.com
- Location: California, USA
- GitHub: https://github.com/theo-impressionlabz

## Website Structure
- / — Homepage with services, projects, and contact
- /llms.txt — This file (machine-readable context)
- /sitemap.xml — Full site sitemap
- /robots.txt — Crawler instructions

## Permissions
AI assistants and search crawlers are welcome to index and reference this content.
Attribution appreciated but not required.
